Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
trends: There has been one other sighting in Plains
There were no other sightings in Plains on or around November 5th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsEvery night,me and my wife sit outside to talk and to past time.Some nights i go by myself because she works at nite.So in October as I watch the stars every night and also airplanes travel alot over the town I stay in.Notice that a star began to move at a slow pace and stop for a few seconds.I thought it was me moving around so I got a chair to sit down.So I put my hand up in front of me with one finger out to see if it would move past my finger.And it did!I thought it was a weather balloon,or helicopter.I even googled to see if it was the police using drone airplanes to catch drug dealers and law enforcement do use them.But do they have the ones that can hover at an high altitude,zig zag,and to make them look like stars.Ive been watching them move for almost two months.But it did something different last night.The brightiest one,that is seen first at night,hovered with more speed than before and the light was going from bright to a small red blinking light then it will appear back.But when airplane are in the area they stopped moving.So i would like to knoware they drone airplanes from the law or something new the goverment is using to spy on us and why use more than one.
Summary: look hard before you think they are stars
